sqlMap.select: select DIMENSION_ID, DIM_TYPE_ID, TASK_ID, TASK_START_TYPE, TASK_START_TIME, TASK_START_DAY, TASK_START_TN, TASK_END_TIME, TASK_POLLING_INTERVAL, TASK_ENABLE from BAT_TASK_DIM where trim(DIMENSION_ID) = #dimensionId:CHAR# and trim(DIM_TYPE_ID) = #dimTypeId:CHAR# and trim(TASK_ID) = #taskId:CHAR#
sqlMap.delete: delete from BAT_TASK_DIM where trim(DIMENSION_ID) = #dimensionId:CHAR# and trim(DIM_TYPE_ID) = #dimTypeId:CHAR# and trim(TASK_ID) = #taskId:CHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into BAT_TASK_DIM (DIMENSION_ID, DIM_TYPE_ID, TASK_ID, TASK_START_TYPE, TASK_START_TIME, TASK_START_DAY, TASK_START_TN, TASK_END_TIME, TASK_POLLING_INTERVAL, TASK_ENABLE) values (#dimensionId:CHAR#, #dimTypeId:CHAR#, #taskId:CHAR#, #taskStartType:CHAR#, #taskStartTime:CHAR#, #taskStartDay:DECIMAL#, #taskStartTn:DECIMAL#, #taskEndTime:CHAR#, #taskPollingInterval:DECIMAL#, #taskEnable:CHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update BAT_TASK_DIM set TASK_START_TYPE = #taskStartType:CHAR#, TASK_START_TIME = #taskStartTime:CHAR#, TASK_START_DAY = #taskStartDay:DECIMAL#, TASK_START_TN = #taskStartTn:DECIMAL#, TASK_END_TIME = #taskEndTime:CHAR#, TASK_POLLING_INTERVAL = #taskPollingInterval:DECIMAL#, TASK_ENABLE = #taskEnable:CHAR# where trim(DIMENSION_ID) = #dimensionId:CHAR# and trim(DIM_TYPE_ID) = #dimTypeId:CHAR# and trim(TASK_ID) = #taskId:CHAR#

update BAT_TASK_DIM
TASK_START_TYPE = #taskStartType:CHAR#
TASK_START_TIME = #taskStartTime:CHAR#
TASK_START_DAY = #taskStartDay:DECIMAL#
TASK_START_TN = #taskStartTn:DECIMAL#
TASK_END_TIME = #taskEndTime:CHAR#
TASK_POLLING_INTERVAL = #taskPollingInterval:DECIMAL#
TASK_ENABLE = #taskEnable:CHAR#
where trim(DIMENSION_ID) = #dimensionId:CHAR# and trim(DIM_TYPE_ID) = #dimTypeId:CHAR# and trim(TASK_ID) = #taskId:CHAR#
sqlMap.select: select DIMENSION_ID, DIM_TYPE_ID, TASK_ID, TASK_START_TYPE, TASK_START_TIME, TASK_START_DAY, TASK_START_TN, TASK_END_TIME, TASK_POLLING_INTERVAL, TASK_ENABLE from BAT_TASK_DIM where trim(DIMENSION_ID) = #dimensionId:CHAR# and trim(TASK_ID) = #taskId:CHAR# and trim(DIM_TYPE_ID) <> #dimTypeId:CHAR#

select DIMENSION_ID, DIM_TYPE_ID, TASK_ID, TASK_START_TYPE, TASK_START_TIME, TASK_START_DAY, TASK_START_TN, TASK_END_TIME, TASK_POLLING_INTERVAL, TASK_ENABLE from BAT_TASK_DIM where trim(DIM_TYPE_ID) = #dimTypeId:CHAR# and trim(TASK_ID) = #taskId:CHAR#
sqlMap.delete: delete from BAT_TASK_DIM where trim(DIM_TYPE_ID) = #dimTypeId:CHAR# and trim(TASK_ID) = #taskId:CHAR#
